mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sports_equipment (item_name, item_price, note) VALUES (#{itemName},#{itemPrice},#{note})

INSERT INTO sports_equipment_order (employee_orderer, branch_no, sports_equipment_no, quantity, total_price, employee_approver, order_status) VALUES (#{employeeOrderer},#{branchNo},#{sportsEquipmentNo},#{quantity},#{totalPrice},#{employeeApprover},#{orderStatus})

INSERT INTO sports_equipment_img (sports_equipment_no, sports_equipment_img_origin_name, sports_equipment_img_file_name, sports_equipment_img_size, sports_equipment_img_type) VALUES (#{sportsEquipmentNo},#{sportsEquipmentImgOriginName},#{sportsEquipmentImgFileName},#{sportsEquipmentImgSize},#{sportsEquipmentImgType})
mapper.select: SELECT sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice, note, createdate, updatedate FROM sports_equipment WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}

SELECT order_no orderNo, employee_orderer employeeOrderer, branch_no branchNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, quantity, total_price totalPrice, createdate, updatedate, employee_approver employeeApprover, order_status orderStatus FROM sports_equipment_order WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT sports_equipment_img_no sportsEquipmentImgNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, sports_equipment_img_origin_name sportsEquipmentImgOriginName, sports_equipment_img_file_name sportsEquipmentImgFileName, sports_equipment_img_size sportsEquipmentImgSize, sports_equipment_img_type sportsEquipmentImgType, createdate, updatedate FROM sports_equipment_img WHERE sports_equipment_img_no = #{sportsEquipmentImgNo}
